DOC.brief_title: Motivating Type O- Blood Donors Return
DOC.detailed_description: In study investigator recruit first-time Group O- O+ donor four week donation use donor database New York Blood Center Hoxworth Blood Center . Eligible donor contact via email invite participate study . Interested donor randomly assign either Intervention condition receive motivational interview implementation intention intervention phone call Control condition receive standard donor recruitment phone call . Outcome measure assess telephone contact use online questionnaire , donation attempt track one year . The investigator use survival analysis examine effect intervention retention one-year follow-up . Path analysis also use examine potential mediator intervention effect . The investigator hypothesis donor receive motivational interview implementation intention intervention large increase positive donation attitude perceive behavioral control contribute enhance intention donation attempt .
